## IChartDataCell.Formula property

Gets or sets the formula in A1-style.

```csharp
public string Formula { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp
[C#]
IChartDataCell cell = workbook.GetCell(0, "B2");
cell.Formula = "1 + SUM(F2:H5)";
```
